application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Replacement of front gate with new front gate, and part new front timber panel. and external alterations
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The replacement gate, by reason of its design, materiality and consequent appearance, fails to respect the architectural character of the locally listed building and fails to either </span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the site and wider Graham Road and Mapledene Conservation Area, of which it forms part. </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">As such the proposed development is contrary to policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), and LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets)&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">of the Hackney LP33 Local Plan, and policies D3 (Optimising site capacity through the design-led approach) and </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">D4 (Delivering good design) and HC1 (Heritage Conservation and Growth) of the London Plan 2021 and the guidance contained in the ‘Residential Extensions and Alterations’, SPD, NPPF Paragraph 202. </span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-cd4083ac-7fff-729b-d58a-39f83a08ff90"><br></span></p>
